attributes.review: 5 minutes into having the app i started to feel very nauseous. i went to go get food when my oven started running away. i sprinted after it when i saw peppa telling me to go home! i kept chasing after my oven when i saw a trump 2020 sign and completely threw up and fainted. i woke up in the hospital and 7 hours later i died of downloading this awful app😣. moral of the story: listen to peppa and know that this app is very dangerous and isn’t a joke and needs to be taken down asap! #savinglives #genzwillrise
attributes.title: take the app down😌💅

attributes.review: Minutes after downloading this app to support our  amazing president I instantly started seeing ads for Russian websites on my phone, then my phone crashed and now it’s glitching. Don’t download this app and definitely don’t vote for a guy who makes apps with Russian viruses
attributes.title: This app gave my phone a virus

attributes.review: Such a disgrace of an app. Constantly asking me for my social security number and my bank Information. The App then proceeds to remove $1000 from my bank account and states it for the “Premium” app. This app needs to be Removed so no one goes through this again!!!!
attributes.title: Such a beautiful app

this app decide to have a mind in its own and go outside into the garbage where it belong of course then the truck came and picked it up there was a whole commotion going on that they didn’t want it and it wasn’t healthily for the Environment it was a mess I DO NOT RECOMMEND... DO NOT DOWNLOAD THIS APP I REPEAT NOT WORTH IT

attributes.review: This app caused my phone to get hacked 🤡and I got locked out of my phone for 3 weeks I knew the password but when I emailed Apple they said that my account had been logged into right after I downloaded the app ! And when I had the app my poor innocent eyes I saw NUDES on their IM DISGUSTED I hope that I never see that

The app glitched and crashed my phone, had to restart multiple times, ruined my battery life. It’s been quite clear the last couple of years that the Oompa Loompa Cheeto looking dolt that is trump clearly doesn’t have an over abundance of education.
attributes.title: Awful creation- the app or the pres, take a pick

attributes.review: As I opened the app, I saw a cursed image of a Cheeto man. Now, I’m not one to believe in curses but let me tell you that as soon as I closed the app the Cheeto pig man appeared in front of me (live and in stereo).  The Cheeto pig squealed so hard that my eardrums ruptured. So naturally, I punched the Cheeto pig and ran away. I’m now hiding in a closet. . . Pray for me! I think someone is coming
attributes.title: Never Again 🤢

This app is the worst made app ever created, it has so many fake people on it. It looks like it was created by kids, and it’s worthless. By far the worst app in the App Store. So many bots and hate spread through the app. I am almost tempted to never download any app every again for fear it will be as worthless as this one.
attributes.title: WORST APP EVER

attributes.review: Everything about this app was awful just like the man it was made for. Similar to how he couldn’t run a country without everything falling apart, I couldn’t click on anything without the app quitting. I don’t know who let  a sex offender with dementia make an app but the result is very disappointing.
